body.name: JASGOOD Nylon Canvas Breathable Military Tactical Men Waist Belt With Plastic Buckle
features: Fabric type Nylon Strap with Plastic Buckle

This military belt makes with lightweight and wear-resisting nylon material that has a strong evaporation of sweat, more comfortable and breathable, feel more flexible, easy to dry in air.Perfect for summer wear
It suitable for pant size below 35 inches. The total length is 105cm(41.3Inch), strap width is 3.8 cm(1.5 Inch). Buckle length: 5.2 cm(2 Inch), Buckle Width:4.5cm(1.8 Inch)
Fully Adjustable.You can precisely adjust your belt to the perfect fit. Removable automatic Buckle,no holes in belt.If the Strap is too long for you, you can trim the strap length to fit your size.

Nickel free international standard plastic buckle, feel comfortable and easy to wear. Non-metallic buckle for easy, quick clearance at security checkpoints. Especially suitable for metal allergy to wear, not easy to crack and breakage

Not only used for daily wearing, but also a good partner for outdoors sports ,hunting and shooting,etc.It’s also a nice gift for men,husband,boyfriend,father,son and friends as Valentine’s day gift,Thanksgiving gift, Christmas gift and New Year gift.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: An Attitude To Life --- We Just Want To Do It Better. Everyone wants to get good products by saving part of the budget. We have been sticking to the essence for so many years, without reducing materials due to rising costs. There are many nylon belts with the same style and lower cost on the market. You should know that good products need good materials to support it. We can also seize the market at a lower cost through inferior nylon, but we have not done so. We just want to do better.

Simple and Convenient The way to tie the belt is simple. Pass the belt through the buckle. Just press the buckle down can be completed. Nickel Free Buckle Nickel free international standard plastic buckle, feel comfortable and easy to wear. Non-metallic buckle for easy, quick clearance at security checkpoints. Fully Adjustable Removable automatic Buckle,no holes in belt. If the Strap is too long for you, you can trim the strap length to fit your size. Thicken Nylon Strap This military belt makes with lightweight and wear-resisting nylon material that has a strong evaporation of sweat, more comfortable and breathable

JASGOOD Nylon Canvas Breathable Military Tactical Men Waist Belt Superior Material: -Resisting nylon material that has a strong evaporation of sweat, more comfortable and breathable, feel more flexible. Adjustable Size: -Removable automatic Buckle,no holes in belt. -If the Strap is too long for you, you can trim the strap length to fit your size. Nickel free plastic buckle: -Non-metallic buckle for easy, quick clearance at security checkpoints.

This Nylon Belt Suitable For Any Occasion Adjustable plastic buckle can easily match with jeans, casual pants, outdoor sports pants. Not only used for daily wearing, but also a good partner for outdoors sports ,hunting and shooting,etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars JASGOOD Tactical Waist Belt: Durable, Comfortable, and TSA-Approved!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the JASGOOD Nylon Canvas Tactical Men Waist Belt with Plastic Buckle, and it has exceeded my expectations in more ways than one. Here's why I highly recommend this belt for anyone in need of a reliable and versatile accessory:**1. Exceptional Durability:**The nylon canvas construction of this belt is incredibly durable, making it suitable for a wide range of activities. Whether I'm hiking, traveling, or simply going about my day, the JASGOOD Tactical Belt has proven to withstand the rigors of daily use.**2. Comfortable and Adjustable:**Comfort is key, and this belt delivers. The adjustable length allows for a perfect fit, ensuring both comfort and security. The breathable material prevents discomfort during prolonged wear, making it ideal for various outdoor and indoor activities.**3. Sturdy Plastic Buckle:**The plastic buckle is not only sturdy but also provides quick and easy adjustments. It securely fastens the belt in place without any slipping or loosening, giving me confidence that it will hold up in various situations.**4. Versatile Tactical Design:**The tactical design adds a touch of style while also serving practical purposes. The belt is equipped with loops for carrying additional gear or attaching accessories, making it a versatile accessory for those who appreciate functionality.**5. TSA-Approved for Travel:**One of the standout features is that the JASGOOD Tactical Belt is TSA-approved. This is a game-changer for frequent travelers like myself. The plastic buckle allows for hassle-free security checks, and I appreciate the convenience it adds to my travel experience.**6. Wide Range of Color Options:**Personalization is important, and JASGOOD offers a variety of color options to suit individual preferences. Whether you prefer a classic black or a more vibrant color, there's a choice for everyone.**Conclusion:**In conclusion, the JASGOOD Nylon Canvas Tactical Men Waist Belt with Plastic Buckle is a fantastic investment for those seeking a durable, comfortable, and versatile belt. The TSA approval is a significant bonus for travelers, adding an extra layer of convenience. Whether you're an outdoor enthusiast, a frequent traveler, or simply in need of a reliable everyday belt, this product delivers on its promises. I highly recommend the Tactical Belt to anyone in search of quality and functionality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These might last forever and they are simple to use, extremely affordable, and comfortable.
reviews.reviewText: I bought my first two Jasgood belts in August of 2018, a black one and a brown one. I wear the black one nearly every day and have since I bought it. When they came, they each came with a second buckle (they are plastic or Nylon) with a sticker that said "Gift" on them and I thought, "Great, these are so cheap, they probably break in a week." Nope. I've never needed them.I've also never needed to buy a replacement and only recently bought another Jasgood belt because I wanted a different color. I will soon add three photos, of the buckle, the middle back where leather belts tend to get bend and wear badly (the Jasgood is barely flexed there) and the tip of the belt. I wear this belt 3+ days a week and have since I bought it in 2018.Buy a longer length than you need because you can cut it down to fit and if you buy it too short you will have to return it or give it to someone smaller than you. They are infinitely adjustable, so you could leave it long and just have a long "tongue" hanging out of the buckle if you thought you were going to get bigger (say if it was only a little large and it was for a growing child, for example).They come with an elastic loop to retain the belt tip also, but you can actually leave this off and just use a loop of the pants you are wearing if you prefer. I cannot recommend these belts highly enough for durability and comfort. They are extremely light and strong. You won't even know you're wearing it. There are many brands that look similar, but I can't speak for them, I have only bought, and will only ever buy, JASGOOD.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Thin and strong
reviews.reviewText: So it's a strong belt. It holds well when I give it a tug. It's thin nylon so it's actually a little flimsy. You cant push it through the loops from a few inches away, you have to control the end the whole way through loops.Pay attention where it goes through the buckle. The first time I wasnt paying attention and didn't put it in the correct slot, and it was very difficult to remove!I like it. It's very functional, and strong, and looks good enough look to be an outer belt in most occasions. I might go for a thicker one if I need another for sturdiness.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great belt, extra buckle is nice gift
reviews.reviewText: I bought one of these belts in 2018, and wore it almost daily. The plastic buckle finally broke 5 years later, but the belt itself was still good, it's really durable. I liked the belt so much I ordered it again, and it comes with an extra buckle, what an awesome gift! I was able to fix the old belt and now I've got a new one. Really great seller for including the extra buckle. Thank you

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Belt - Good Customer Service
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this belt about 3 years ago. After years of tough use, the belt buckle broke, but the belt was still in good condition. Since this belt worked great, I ordered another of the same belt. Along with the new belt with buckle, they also sent a free second buckle that I put on my old belt, now my old one is as good as new and I have two belts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice concept… bad follow through
reviews.reviewText: Purchased this thinking I was purchasing 2 belts. Not true, but shame on me for not reading through the full description. The belts material is made well and is holding up well also. It came with 2 buckles and I’m assuming they sent 2 because of issues with the quality. It is a thin plastic. It had not failed yet (and it may never, I really don’t know) but every time I wear this belt I’m fearful the buckle will fail at some point during the day. I don’t wear the belt everyday but I’d say I wear it at least 1-2 a week. I only gave the three star because of the quality of the buckle. Had the quality of the buckle been better definitely would have given higher review and would have purchased more colors

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Durable and lightweight belt
reviews.reviewText: Best belt I've ever had. I use it for work, hikes, and any other casual event. The buckle is easy to close and open. It holds very well and fits nicely. It doesn't stretch, which I like, but it's easy to cut and size. It looks good with any fabric and color. I used to buy more expensive brands like Nike, Dickies, and whatever Target sells, and I will never buy them again.
PRODOTTO SECONDO LE ASPETTATIVE E CONSEGNA PUNTUALE.

reviews.reviewTitle: An excellent product. Better engineered than some name brand nylon ...
reviews.reviewText: An excellent product. Better engineered than some name brand nylon belts that you can buy on this site. There are three reasons why this belt is better than the name brand. This belt's webbing is a sturdy gage, a heavier gage than the name brand which gives better waist control on your pants. The tip of the this belt is slightly tapered which makes it easier to thread through the belt loops on your pants, The end of the belt on the name brand product is not tapered which makes it difficult to thread through belt loops.. Lastly, this belt itself contains an adjustable , elasticized loop that allows you to tuck in the end of your belt for a clean and tidy appearance. No such loop on the name brand which means the end of your belt just hangs loose. Do yourself a favour. Buy this belt, not the name brand one. It is a better belt at a better price.

Honestly one of the best belts I've ever owned. I liked it so much I bought a second within a week of buying the first.. Im writing this review months after owning them both and they are both in great condition. Strong build, good material, and well designed. The belts adjust within millimeters of desired size, and lock in and hold. I use it backpacking, and for everyday wear. Only thing to note is that it is a canvas belt, so don't expect it to look like a dress belt. Its a utility/cargo belt that looks good for everyday wear.
